thread.section_title: Hotel Le Clos Notre Dame - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: small hotel with the great location
thread.title_full: small hotel with the great location - Review of Hotel Le Clos Notre Dame, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: asma110
title: small hotel with the great location
text: very nice small hotel in the center of the city, 2 minutes walking/close to the metro St. Michel metro stop and Notre Dame cathedral. room is very small as it was expected with the modern shower. Very supportive and nice staff. Good free WiFi. Nice breakfast. I would recommend to stay there.
